1111.title: Ass

1113.content:
Craig flipped through the pages absent-mindedly. He was not really invested in reading “Catcher in the Rye” but Mr.Garrison insisted that there is an adult scene in the middle. So far, he is three fourth into the book and it’s all just drama that he lost focus on. Suddenly, he heard a dripping sound. It was wet and slick and he hoped that it wasn’t the ventilation again.

         “Tweek, could look at the vent and see if it is leaking?” Craig said in his monotonous voice.

         Tweek did not answer but the dripping noise grew louder. Craig called again but there was no response. The dripping noise then soon turned into a huge splash. Finally, Craig closed his book and looked at his room’s vent. No sign of water. Although, when he looked at where Tweek should be, he is nowhere to be found. In his place was a viscous slime and it seems to be moving towards him.

         “Tweek, what the fuck is this?” Craig looked around the room but he can’t find Tweek. “Tweek!?”

         The slime groped his leg. Craig tried to pull it away but his hands seem to just pass through. He tried scooping the liquid and flicking it away. But that was useless too. The slime continued to climb Craig despite his pleas.

         “Mom!? Craig knew that no one would answer. His mom and dad was out and his sister as well. But he continued to call them until the liquid climbed aboard his wide open mouth. Craig tried to scream once more but the liquid has engulfed his mouth completely. He was swallowing more of the liquid than air. Craig looked around the room to look for his phone. But the lack of air is making him drowzy. He fell on the floor with the whole world around him turning dark.

----


         Tweek opened his eyes and looked around the room. It was Craig’s room like he remembered it. He looked at where the mirror should be and the reality he will be facing. Instead of his ruffled hair and scrambled shirt, he wore a blue dangling hat and his clothes are neat. He looked at his fingers. They weren’t the fingers scarred multiple times with hot coffee. His fingers were clean and meticulously taken care of. There’s no urging call for him to twitch nor to scream. For the first time ever since he was born, he felt at peace.

         “I really am Craig.” Tweek said in Craig’s monotonous voice.

         He stood up from his spot and walked closer to the mirror. From the way he moved and the way he looked, he is undoubtedly Craig. Tweek traced along his face and to the bridge of his soft featured nose. Down to the clean shaven chin and the short somewhat chubby legs. He reached up to his hair and realized how his fingers could easily course through them, unlike his. Everywhere he smelled, it reminded of the Craig.

         Tweek undressed his hat and then his coat. He realized that despite looking chubby on the outside, he is lean on the inside. Next, he undressed his remaining garments and saw Craig’s whole bare being. Craig was just like any other kid out there. He never really like Craig for how he looked. He liked him for how he acted. He was contrast to his impulsive behavior. And now that he is inside him with a comple view for what he is, Tweek realized at how much he liked him more.

         Tweek dressed once again and delve into Craig’s bed. He hugged one pillow and took a deep whiff. The presence of Craig is every where. And he liked it.
1113.title: Mouth

12.content:
Ever since the yaoi girls fiasco, something brewed up inside Clyde that he hadn’t felt before. It was deep and so depressed with his stoic attitude, that he is oddly surprised to know that he is Bisexual. And ever since he grasped that truth, he couldn’t look straight at his friend’s faces. More so at Tweek who accepted him as his new boyfriend.

For the start of the summer vacation, Craig was absent-mindedly browsing the web for some stimulation. Looking for porn seems unappealing now that he has double the people he can fap on. He wanted to go online and see what his friends are doing. But that would make his friends know that he was online and they would start asking question for his week long staycation. And so, he was busy scrolling on some forgotten website that hasn’t updated since the 90s.

As he was scrolling, on ad caught his attention. It wasn’t made of 90s clip-art nor the low resolution pictures that plagued the site. This ad was new and it seemed to poke right through his problems.

“Lost?” The ad said in bold Impact typeface. The ad perfectly summed Craig. He was intrigued and so he clicked. And as he do, something hit Craig in the head. He looked around but saw no one. The hit must be strong since he suddenly found himself losing consciousness on the floor.

----

In the expanse of darkness, Craig was floating and lost. He was naked with no clothes to shelter him from the slow breeze under him. In the darkness, there was a glint of light that caught Craig’s gaze. The light grew brighter and approached Craig. It was an orb and it was floating closer and closer. Craig tried to float away but he was too slow. The orb collided him and flashes of knowledge and power surged through his bare mind. The orb was bestowing him the power to understand other people. A power to possess their mind and body. A power to understand other people’s place in the world.

Craig woke up in cold sweat. He looked at his fingers and saw them become translucent.

----

What will Craig do now?
12.title: Craig

121.content:
It was so sudden but Craig seemed to accept the change easily. Although, a walk would be nice to get his systems going. He is going to use his powers sooner or later.

         Where will Craig go?
121.title: Go somewhere

1211.content:
A walk to Clyde’s house would be nice. It’s just by the corner so it would be a quick refreshing walk. And his dad might be on their shoe store so Clyde is alone in his house. That is, if he isn’t in the playground with the others.

---

Craig pressed the doorbell. The tone rang but there was no reply. Craig pressed it again.

“Coming.” Clyde said. A moment later, Clyde opened the door and it looks like he just finished taking a bath. “Craig. I haven’t saw you in a very long time.”

“I was gone for only a week.”

“And that’s long time for me.” Clyde invited Craig inside and let him sit by the sofa. “So what brings you here? Did you bring Tweek?”

“No. I haven’t talked to him for a week.”

“Are you having problems? I can help.”

“No. I just need to take my mind off things. Adjust to this new reality. I never really considered that I would like a boy.”

“That’s sad dude. Although, you’re luckier than me.”

“Why is that?”

“You already had a relationship. I’ve been working out the past few weeks and I couldn’t even land a single chick.” Clyde moved closer and raised his shirt. He grabbed one of Craig’s hands and pulled it towards his belly. “Feel this? My abs are showing. A girl promised me that she would be my chick if I formed abs.”

Suddenly, something cold hit Clyde’s stomach. He looked down and saw that the cold was coming from Craig’s hand. Craig was surprised as well. He saw that his hand passed through Clyde’s stomach. He knew what it was. He nearly possessed him.

“Dude, what was that?”
1211.title: Donovan Residence

12113.content:
“What was that?” Clyde asked. He looked at Craig’s hands. They look normal but they felt cold. Colder than the snow outside.

         “Just something I found on the internet.” Craig said. There was no hesitation as he jumped towards Clyde. Like his hands, his whole passed through him. It felt like he was grabbing air. One moment he was looking at Clyde and the other, he was looking at the wall. Wide eyed and barely able to contain his frantic heart.

         “I-” Craig croaked. His monotonous voice was gone. Instead, he had Clyde’s annoying nasal voice. “I’m Clyde.”

         Craig stood up and went to Clyde’s room. He walked to the mirror and admired his stolen figure. He was controlling the school jock and he did not even put up a fight. Clyde undressed his school jacket and touched the abdominal muscles Clyde built over the years of playing football. He was sculpted from the bottom up, except for his face which retained its soft features.

He wonder what that feels like. And most importantly, he has the body of the most built man in their group. Over the past few years, he wondered the contents of his pants. Now that he is inside him, he could get the front view.
12113.title: Possess Clyde

         Stan looked around the room. He knew this wasn’t his room but it was familiar. The faint smell of snow reminded him that he was still at South Park. Stan got out of the bed and looked at what seems to be the mirror. He was in for a surprise when he saw not his face, but the face of...
13.title: Stan

14.content:
"What the fuck did you do fatass!?" screamed a particular red head boy wearing a bright green Ushanka.

The boy in front of him was red-faced and breathing heavily. Their latest trip at Dr. Mephisto's lab turned into disaster.

"It's none of your fuck business you jew!" Cartman's face grew redder, even redder than the hair of the boy in front of him.

"Aw. Fuck. I have this fucking goo in me." The goo, bright green and glinting in the light was indeed covering Kyle. He tried to swipe them off but to no avail, his hands only seem to pass through it. He gave up as he saw Cartman clutching a gerbil with enlarged buttocks. "Mr. Garrison is going to get mad when he sees Lemmiwinks."

The day ebbed away and the moon rose in its midst. The boys went back to their homes, panting but blessed that they rescued Lemmiwinks from further buttocks enlargement. As they walk through the snow clad streets, Kyle was oblivious that the green goo he's desperately removing was entering every orifice in his body. It seeps into the very pores of his body and the chemicals within bonds with his blood.

Back at his home, he went to the bathroom and prepared for the night. He spat the remains of his toothpaste and looked at himself in the mirror. "Hm. Must have evaporated off." he said pertaining to the goo before.

His dreams that very night were clear as day. He's a slime in his dream, slithering in every crevices and nooks. Underneath him, a boy of golden hair and bright orange parka sleeps in the shadow. A feeling swells inside Kyle. Like he needs to lunge at the boy beneath and if he doesn't, he thinks that it would make him feel terrible. And so he does.

He jumped at the boy's face hidden beneath a thin film of clothes. He entered his mouth, his nose, every hole in his head. The blonde boy woke with a jolt. He desperately tried to remove the thing attacking his face but no matter how hard he tried, his hands just seem to pass through. He could do nothing as he suffocated at the presence invading him.

An alarm woke Kyle in the morning. His face reflected in the mirror, heavily distraught like someone ruffled him in the night. Nevertheless, he managed to fix himself up. Although, there's no fixing the heavy bags underneath his eyes.

A muffled voice, distraught and scared was screaming in the corner. It was Kenny, his hands were flailing and seems to be swiping something off his face. Beside him was Stan, a concerned look hangs on his face.

"What are you talking about?" asked Kyle.

"Oh. Kenny was just talking about a smoke or something attacking him last night. Seems farfetched to me."

At that moment, Kyle connected the dots. "Did he do that last night?" he asked himself. It's impossible. It's just a dream. Although, his distraught face in the morning and bagged eyes supports Kenny's story.

At the bus, he sat as far away from his friend. In the back of the school bus where no one sat until the bus neared the school. Kyle looked at his hands and focused. He doesn't know why he's looking at his hands but it feels like the right thing to do right now. In the corner of his eyes, he swear he could see the tips of his finger turn green. Wispy smoke emanates from them, dancing in accordance to his breathing. And at one moment that he blinks, his fingers were back to normal.

The rest of the morning period went without a hitch. Mr. Garrison talked about something in math and getting angry midway through. He can't remember why he got angry as he was focusing intently on his hands.

"Dude, you alright? You've been staring at your hands all morning." Stan asked reassuringly.

"Yeah. I'm alright. I just need to get to the bathroom."

Looking back, whatever was that thing on Dr. Memphisto's lab turned him this way. He's probably turning into the very goo that changed him. He needs to go to Dr. Memphisto's lab and ask for a fix for whatever is happening to him. Although what they did last night, his chances are close to zero.

Kyle could do nothing but lock himself at the bathroom. His hands on closer watch are colored green now and they are sweating green viscous slime. He went for the sink to rinse off the goo but as he lurched forward, his feet along with his shoes turned to slime. His other feet too turned and from the looks of it, his whole body is changing to goo. A good second later, Kyle turned completely to goo.

His perspective of the world changed. He could see all around him including underneath himself. He tried to move forward and his whole body moved swiftly in accordance. He could feel himself as being warm like and throbbing. His surface glinted the light above and sparkled onto different shades of green.

The door behind Kyle creaked open, welcoming another person. He slid to the nearest stall and viewed the person. Who was it?
14.title: Kyle

141.content:
"Dude?" Stan Marsh asked. His best friend was acting strange all day and it's been bugging him out. He looked pale when Kenny was talking about the ridiculous thing that happened to him last night. He did not sit beside him at the bus. He was mostly quiet all morning, only answering questions in the most succinct way. And most strange of all, he was looking too much at his hands. Stan could admit that Kyle's hands did indeed look strange. One moment he saw that it was smoking. Another second then it's not. Stan could blame that to his sleeplessness last night.

         Stan pushed aside the bathroom door and surprisingly, Kyle wasn't here. He could swear that he saw him entering here. "Kyle, you in here dude?" He asked once again. Maybe, he's in one of the stalls. But come to think of it, there's no feet on the ground. Just that shining green thing in the second stall.

         Stan moved towards the stall and opened it. One moment he was perplexed the other he was reaching for air. The thing, whatever it is, lunged at him. It jumped so fast that all he could see was a streak of green and the world around him tinted with it. He tried to grab the thing, it felt slimy and viscous. Strangely, his hands only seem to pass through it. Stan looked around and strode for the sink. He opened the tap and washed himself with water. The water however, stopped sat the surface and to the ground. He tried once more but the attempt was all the same. He sat down, trying to breath a sliver of air. But the thing was blocking down his mouth and nose and seems to be invading him.

         As the last bits of consciousness flicked at him, he could hear Kenny inaudible whisper-shouting.

----

         "Where's the serum Mephesto?" A hooded mam growled. His crimson robes obscured his face but never hiding the hastened shave of a stubble.

         "It's gone," A round man said. His face looks trodden a heavy dread surrounds him. "along with my lab, it's all gone."

         "What do you mean gone?" The hooded man was audibly irritated. His feet shuffled in the ground kicking lightly the destroyed rubble.

         "The container holding it shattered. Broke. It must have evaporated off the ground."

         "The formula we gave you is distinctly clear. It can't have evaporated on the ground." The man flailed his hands on the ground before nudging his fingers on the bridge of his nose. "It'll be another three years before we could make another drop. And I've waited enough. Make something that could detect the person who ingested the serum. And make it quick."

         The man straightened his hood and look briefly at the defeated man at the rubble. "I know a man who could fix this place back. Just remember our deal or you'll suffer the consequences."

         "All right. All right. Just leave me with my babies." And by babies, he meant the cat corpses with multiple buttocks littering the field.

----

         Kyle's wake up call wasn't something to look forward to. His face was splashed with cold water and in the ensuing shock, he hit his head on the sink. His hands was quick to address the droning pain. In a moment's realization, if he could feel pain, he must have turned back to his solid body again. Above him, he closed the tap and helped himself up.

         He could not describe what he felt for the next few moments. He call it confusion and disbelief. A moment later, he decided on the latter. What stood in front of him was a mirror and inside that mirror was bright as day, Stan Marsh. His face wet and cheeks flustered in signature icy pink. His hands still stamped to where he his head hit the sink was mimed by the image in the mirror. He could not believe what he was seeing, he was Stan Marsh.

         Back again at the stall, he sat at the toilet rim and looked at his hands. Sure enough they weren't releasing smoke or glinting in the light. His hands rather were as white as milk, free from blotches that ravaged his previous fingers.

         "I'm not crazy." Kyle said expecting his old voice. What came out was Stan's slightly nasal tune. He tried to repeat the words, praying to change back. Every time, Stan's voice welcomed him, telling him he's not crazy.

         Kyle recollected what he was doing before he's inside his best friend. He remembers turning to goo and hiding in one of the stalls. He remembers hearing the door creak and Stan searching for him. A feeling grew inside Kyle, insidious like those in his dreams. Or where they even dreams at all? Nevertheless, it grew like it grew quickly. A searing voice screamed inside his head to possess. To take over as quickly as he can. Before he knew it, he was lunging at his friend. He filled every crevices possible. The next, he was satisfied and all was blank.

         A bell rang in the distance, signifying the start of lunch. Kyle missed most of third period and in a way, Stan did too. He left the bathroom and searched for his friends. Sure enough, they were at their usual place. Kyle look around and saw that a few people were missing. Jimmy and Timmy are gone. They are doing their Science Bee and won't return until three days later at Monday. Cartman suddenly vanished. He was at the bus station this morning and at first period. Other than that, the others where talking and Kenny mimicking what happened to Stan seconds prior.

         "It was drowning me." Kenny said, his voice muffled by a layer of Parka. Kenny turned at Kyle and patted a seat beside him. "Oh hi Stan. Where's Kyle?"

         "Home. He was sick." Kyle quickly muttered. If he talk fast enough, they would notice the stutter.

         "Gee golly, Cartman was sick too." Butters butted in.

         As quickly as it began, the conversation divulged towards the latest Terrence and Phillip movie. For the first time, Kyle forgot that he was inside the body of his best friend. He kept talking, boasting and laughed with them. The fun ended when the bell rang once again. Students cleared off their tables and run off to the next class.

         On the way, Kyle's worries resurfaced. He needs someone to talk to, someone that can help him cope with this dilemma. Chef, if he were here could help him greatly. Come to think of it, Chef solved a problem just like this one. Back when Kenny died and his ashes snorted by the assface Cartman. Kenny was inside the fatso for a week. Maybe he could confide this thing to Kenny. Or maybe not.
141.title: Stan

1411.content:
"Kenny" Kyle reached out. Only that the hands doing the reaching weren't his own but that if his best friend. "I need to tell you something."

         "What?" Kenny muttered in covered tones.

         "Let's move somewhere no once can hear us." And by that, they walked towards the right part of the school. The students dwindled as they neared their destination until the only students are the goth kids sitting in their place. They placed themselves far away from the group's prying eyes.

         "I'm the goo you saw last night." Kyle said quietly but loud enough for Kenny to hear. Beneath the worn down parka, Kyle could see confusion. Kenny did not make a single sound, not even to ask if he's crazy. "Also, I'm not Stan. I'm Kyle. I am sort of controlling Stan's body." Like before Kenny was speechless. For a full ten second at least.

         "Cool."

"You don't think I'm crazy?"

         "Of course not dude. I took over that fatass' body last summer." Kenny sat down on the snowed steps. "Remember when he drank my ashes."

         "Yeah." Kyle sat down too. "Anyway, I wanted to ask you how could I return back to normal. This whole thing being Stan is freaking me out."

         "If I were I would enjoy it dude. You could be anyone you want. You could be a girl or a better guy. You could be an adult and do adult stuff." Kenny seemed to be enjoying Kyle's predicament more than he does. Although, Kenny could have a sliver of truth. Why does he want to go back to his old body? Back there, he suffers from his nagging mother and he's always teased as a Jew. Back slat the cafeteria where he was talking to his friends, no one teased him as Stan. Maybe, he could borrow him for a few more hours.

         "I think you're right. Anyway, do you know how I could get out of Stan?" If Kenny was right, he could take over other bodies other than Stan. Who though? The possibilities are many.

         "I'll come by your house this evening. 8 mean, Stan's house. Tell your mom and Stan's that we're having a sleepover." Kyle agreed. It's the weekend tomorrow and a holiday for two days. So that should be four days of no classes. Enough time to sort this thing out. The only problem is Kyle's mother. She tends to freak out on the slightest of things. So basically, his chances of a sudden sleepover is zero.

---

         It was a miracle. Kyle plastered a wide grin on Stan's face for the rest of the day. He texted her mother and she definitely agreed. Apparently, his father and Ike was called suddenly at the Canadian embassy. Something about mismanaged parcel or something. That freaked out her mother than the unplanned sleepover. She would be riding her way now.

         "Oh hi Kenny." Sharon said. It did not take her a lot to fool her into thinking that Kyle was Stan. His father, Randy Marsh, was too busy doing something in the shed. "Do you want some cinnamon bun Kenny?"

         "Thank you." Kenny is visibly famished. He helped himself with two buns and a cup of water before running up to Stan's room. The room, like he last visited is much like his own. The bed and the cabinet full if paraphernalia of their previous adventures.

         "So where do we start?" Kyle asked.

         "Focus about getting out. Then that's just it." Kenny could have said that before. Nevertheless, Kyle's need to rid himself of Stan's body overcame his urge to complain. Kyle closed his eyes and breathed in rhythm with his heart. He could feel it. The wriggling of the thing inside him. It filled every part of him. He focused on detaching all of them, starting from his feet. On a moment's notice, he lost the touch of the cold carpet. His feet wobbled and soon he was crashing to the floor. Kyle lost his focus and the rough carpet caressed his toes once more.

         "You crashed." Kenny said.

         "I know."

         Kyle spent the rest of the day doing the same thing again and again. Only ping as far as losing the sense of his upper legs. He took only one break and that is the ham dinner he took with Stan's family. Randy was back from the shed covered in a mixture of grease oil and sweat. Sharon berated him about his sweat and shaming the family to Kenny. He retorted that Kenny is used to the smell since his family lives with hobos. Thus resulted in more silent-shouting and Stan's sister, Kelly, screaming that no one notices her anymore. He blames Stan for everything of course. Once dinner was over, Kyle and Kenny sped back to Stan's room.

         Kyle's heavy stomach reduced his ability to focus. He ate too much and he thinks Kenny did so too. They jumped on the bed, eyes to the cold and blank ceiling.

         "Aren't you curious?" Kenny said, breaking the minute of silence.

         "About what?"

         "About Stan's dick. You have it and you haven't seen it yet." This apparently surprised Kyle. The thought haven't crossed his mind and probably never will without Kenny. He never took a bathroom break once and have never changed his clothes yet. Thinking of what it looks like just tickles his curiosity more.

         "Why would I want to see it?"

         "It's just I'm curious you know. When I'm in Cartman's body, I can't see his dick with his belly in the way. Aren't you curious too?"

         This talk about dicks is making him uneasy. At the same time, he could swear that his sensation in his private area heightened by the thousand. He could feel it shuffle towards the left, the throbbing and its rising.

         "Look you have a hard on." Kenny was right. A tent is forming in his pants and us getting more profound by the second.

         "For fucks sake, I'm not gay." Kyle retorted. He's not gay nevertheless, Stan's dick thinks farther than his mind.

         "What's that supposed to do with being gay? You're inside Stan's body, you have as much right to jack off."

         "Jack off!?" That very thought is out of bounds. But why is he setting this boundaries though? The tent is visibly bigger now and it's starting to hurt. "Jack off." Kyle said once again, this time more slowly.

         "I could help you." Kenny is full of surprises today. "By the way, I'm Bi so don't worry." Everyone knows his Bisexual. He never lost that liking to both male and female after the Metrosexual conundrum that plagued the town's men. His father, Stuart, screamed for days.

         Kyle's cheek flustered. Could he really do this to his best friend's body? It's really painful now and the only thing that could cure it is jacking off. At the back of his mind, he could remember that jacking off focuses the mind. Surely this is helpful to his cause right?

Kenny separates that two but as the two parts got closer, it rushed and stuck together like magnet. He pocketed the curious thing and slept once again. The thought of hiding this thing was lost beneath his dreams of a better house.

"I think I'm going to go to the kitchen for some drinks." Stan expired.

The hang out here every Saturday, mainly to play Guitar Hero or cause ruckus in the internet. Other time, to chill and relax or copy Butter's assignment.

"Did you just electrocute me?" Stan asked, a shocked feeling on his face.

         Whatever the thing that happened, it caused Kenny some great shock. On the other hand, he would be willing to do it again. And so he did. While Stan was kneeling on the floor and wiping the wet floor, he reached his right for his nape. Stan shuddered at the sudden invasion. His body shriveled up and was paralyzed on the spot. He wanted to scream, to ask the nearby Kenny for help but his mouth won't budge.

It feels like he is dipping his fingers on molten marshmallow, only that this marshmallow is more than welcome. His hands are now deep to his elbow and Stan is still paralyzed under him. Kenny now placed his other hand at the nape while pushing his other towards Stan's right. What he is doing right now is akin to wearing a suit. He continued more until both his arms are full inside Stan. He could feel the water trickling between his finger, the cold hard feeling of the floor and the receding shock of fear. Next, Kenny pushed his Torso. Every bit of Stan's flesh welcomed him to an embrace. He sunk warmly and until no visible part of his old body is present. The only thing left now is his head and the full penetration is complete. His borrowed hands found its was to his Stan's Head which is frozen in shock and pushed it towards him. Stan's hair drowned him on a mixture of sweat and Orange Scented Shampoo. He always liked Stan's shampoo. And beneath the hair, he found the abyss welcoming him to Stan's mind. The place is dark yet dappled with the thousand twinkling stars. And one of the stars, as bright as the sun swallowed him, welcoming back to the wet floor Stan was cleaning before.

"Fuck." Kenny said. However, Stan's voice said what he said. "The fuck am I going to do now?" The lack of parka muffling his voice slightly irks Kenny.

His package, scoured within the depths of the internet and tracked with unconventional sources and means , is within his grasp. As soon as he sat at the lavishly black sofa, the doorbell rang. He rushed at the door and found a parcel sitting damply on the marble patio.

"To: Token B." It says.

He grabbed the package swiftly and made a run for it in his room. Once the door was locked, shades drawn and any servant dismissed outside, he opened the brown box. A capsule sits amidst thousand of peanut Styrofoam. A blue capsule that glinted with the crystal light above.

Behind the capsule was an instruction card. Token picked it up and and read the contents under his breath.

"With the mix of technology and malicious magic, Taney and Abbott present the P. CAPSULE. First of its kind and probably one of the fifty made."

"Pop it, drink it and wait. Various tink and tank changes your body to the better. It gives you powers, unconventional, still unlike any other. The incorporeal ability of possession. The ability to phase, enter another's body and control. Inside someone, you do many sorts of things. Jump, Dance, Drink, Fap, Sex, Drugs, everything of your choice!"

"Use responsibly." The final wording said.

In one quick swipe, Token drank the capsule. He could swear his stomach rumble as if a bomb landed inside. His insides whirred, his skin formed bumps and turned back to normal. He was changing into something else then he is getting turned back to his old self. It was an odd feeling yet welcoming. It all ended when he burped a tongue of golden flames.

The next choice is, who to test it on?
153.title: Token

1552.content:
“Fast Pass, you know this serum is unstable. We don’t even know if it’s going to work.” The Mosquito said as he was doing his final preparations. The days of hard work, just for this formula to bring down the super pals.

“Th- Th- Th- This is a risk I- a... I need to take mosquito.” Fast Pass said. Not only that the formula is in complete compatibility with him, he could also use its full potential with his acting skills.

“Then I wish you like bzzzt...”

With amazing speed, Jimmy chugged the formula in one swig. The effects were instantaneous as he felt being light headed and drowzy. The world turned and back flipped, sending him into a speedy daze that nearly wrecked half their base.

“Shut it down!” Coon shouted.

The mosquito can’t do anything. Fast Pass already drank the formula and it’s a one way ticket to peace or to his death.

Fast Pass slowly came to a halt and passed out among the rubble. It did not take long before he woke up again.

“Are you alright? Bzztt...” The mosquito asked. Jimmy is looking paler than usual and he seems to be floating inches above ground. He knew the formula worked.

“Yes Mo- Mo- Mo- Mosquito. I feel weird.” Jimmy smiled.

“That’s okay. Human Kite. The vitals? Bztt...”

“No heartbeat. No Brain Waves. Totally undetectable. By God he is the best spy we have.”

Jimmy smiled once again. The formula worked but this is not the last part of it. He dashed straight through the walls and stopped in front of the covered part of the room. “I- Is he here?”

“Yes Fast Pass. Super Craig took quite a beating just to snatch him.” Coon said. There was something squirming beyond those tattered clothes. It was cursing beyond the gag that was placed on him. The Coon ripped the cloth to reveal...
1552.title: Jimmy

15522.content:
“Get me out of here you assholes!” Mysterion growled. The bonds were too tight for him to escape. They wanted to gag him but they ran out of cloth. The only available ones are Cartman’s dirty underwear. “Don’t you think this has gone too far? Waht do you want from me?”

“You Mysterion. OR should I say, your body. Doctor Timothy’s gaze is far too strong. Freedom Pals forced us to do this.”

“Forced to do what?”

“Jimmy.”

Fast Pass walked nearer towards Mysterion. He looked at him with lust and greed. That squirming body is going to be his and he couldn’t wait a minute longer. Fast Pass crouched and dashed with great speed to where Mysterion is sitting. Instead of hitting him, he phased through and was gone beyond Mysterion’s skin. Mysterion on the other hand, lost consciousness on both surprise and the invading mind inside him. Jimmy was too strong mentally and he could not fight back. Mysterion faded with no fighting chance against his intruder.

“Mysterion? Bzztt... Fast Pass?” Mosquito asked. Fast Pass’ Ectoplasmic reading was gone along with his body. Mysterion’s heartbeat on the other hand died down and returned momentarily. When he woke up, he was smiling.

“It’s me. I think it’s successful.” Fast Pass in Mysterion’s body said.

“Code?” Human Kite asked.

“Cartman is the biggest douchebag.”

“Positive. Cut his bonds Coon.”

With his sharpened claws, the Coon destroyed his mother’s stringy lingerie with ease.

“How do you feel?” The Coon asked.

“I feel, amazing. My stutter is gone.” Fast Pass stumbled by the mirror and awed at his new body. He could walk and talk properly. The clutches that anchored him to the ground was gone. He touched his feet and sure, he could feel a touching sensation over them. “This is super the Coon.”

“Good for you.” The Coon said with a pout on his face. It was supposed to be him who was going to drink the formula not Fast Pass. But the Mosquito said he was too big and the formula is too diluted if he drank it. The Human Kite agreed too even though he don’t know batshit about Chemistry.

“So Fast Pa- Er... Mysterion, do you still remember your mission.”

Mysterion nodded. He was supposed to infiltrate the Freedom Pals’ base, gather intel, destroy them if necessary and sow doubt between its members starting with Mysterion. He would act like a douchebag and probably focus on being a dick to Timmy. He was their leader after all.

“We’ll give you a day to internalize yourself and practice your line okay?”

“Okay.”

Fast Pass walked back upstairs and returned to his house. He was about to enter the Valmer residence when he realized that he wasn’t in his body but Kenny’s. So he doubled back and went to where Kenny’s house should be.

What will Fast Pass do now?
15522.title: Mysterion
